testcase.classname: Test the Get Request for LMSAPI
testcase.name: The user makes a successful Get request
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Get Method to get all programs.............................passed When User sends the get method with endpoints Allprograms...................passed Then The user should get a successful response code 200.....................passed

testcase.classname: Test the put Request for LMSAPI
testcase.name: User successfully get Batch by batch name
testcase.system-out: Given User ensure to perform POST operation for "/batches" with body as.....passed When User sends the get request using Batch name as "bluetooth8344".........passed Then Status code should be 200 ok...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Test the put Request for LMSAPI
testcase.name: User successfully updates Batch by ID
testcase.system-out: Given User ensure to perform POST operation for "/batches" with body as.....passed When User sends the put request using updated Batch ID for "/batches" with body as.passed Then Status code should be 200 ok...........................................passed Then User performs Delete operation to clear the batch for "/batches".......passed

testcase.classname: Test the put Request for LMSAPI
testcase.name: To Update Program By ProgramName
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Put Method with existing ProgramName.......................passed When User sends the put method with updated ProgramName.....................passed Then Status "201" is shown with message "Successfully Updated !!"...........passed
